channel.title: MoparScape forum problem
channel.description:
Is anyone else having problems with the forums today?
I can't view this page http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=unreadreplies It just displays a white page, and when I load MoparScape on my phone, it is just white besides the homepage.
Also when I try to view a board like this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,144.0.html (General Discussion) it is just a white page.
I tried clearing my cache/cookies and it didn't resolve anything. Am I the only one having this problem?
Edit: Also after I clicked post it just went to a white screen lol.

item.title: MoparScape forum problem
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I couldn’t load other pages either, when is the forum upgrade happening anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum problem
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I don’t really know what the problem was, but I think I have fixed it. Let me know if it you run into any more problems.

Oh thanks, I couldn’t log into the forums (had to change password) after I logged out, the login page would go white.

Read full topic
